name: Miser's Chalice
description: A battered tin cup with strange sigils carved into its base, this item channels the tides of fate.
effect: Use this card during your turn to unlock any locked destiny dice, returning the, to the blue space of the fate board. Roll a dice after using it. On a 1 or 2, pass it to the player on your left. On a 3 or 4, discard it. On a 5 or 6, pass it to the player on your right.
